metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8025 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
driver/subprocs.c in XScreenSaver before 5.34 does not properly perform aninternal consistency check, which allows physically proximate attackers tobypass the lock screen by hot swapping monitors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8025` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xscreensaver - 5.34-1ubuntu1
xscreensaver-data - 5.34-1ubuntu1
xscreensaver-data-extra - 5.34-1ubuntu1
xscreensaver-gl - 5.34-1ubuntu1
xscreensaver-gl-extra - 5.34-1ubuntu1
xscreensaver-screensaver-bsod - 5.34-1ubuntu1
xscreensaver-screensaver-webcollage - 5.34-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xscreensaver package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.34-1ubuntu1').
